author: Matthew Rosenberg and Mark Mazzetti
description: Michael T. Flynn told the transition team weeks before the inauguration that he was under federal investigation for secretly working as a lobbyist for Turkey.
title: Trump Team Knew Flynn Was Under Investigation Before He Came to White House

author: Associated Press
description: A lawyer for fired National Security Adviser Michael Flynn has informed the Senate Intelligence Committee he will not honor its subpoena for private documents.
title: Senate intel chair: Michael Flynn won't honor subpoena for private documents

description: Donald Trump asked James Comey, the former FBI director, to end an investigation into Michael Flynn's links to Russia, it was reported on Tuesday night.
title: Donald Trump 'asked James Comey to shut FBI investigation into Michael Flynn'

author: Shannon Pettypiece
description: President Donald Trump denied asking FBI Director James Comey to drop an investigation targeting his former national security adviser, Michael Flynn.
title: Trump Denies Asking Comey to Drop Investigation of Michael Flynn

author: The New York Times
description: The Senate Intelligence Committee invited the former F.B.I. director James B. Comey to testify on reports that President Trump asked him to scuttle the investigation into Michael T. Flynn.
title: Senate Panel Asks Comey to Testify on Flynn and Trump

author: Mark Hosenball and Susan Heavey
description: U.S. President Donald Trump asked then-FBI Director James Comey to end the agency's investigation into ties between former White House national security adviser Michael Flynn and Russia, according to a source who has seen a memo written by Comey.
title: Trump asked Comey to end investigation of Michael Flynn: source

author: Clark Mindock
description: Donald Trump asked former FBI Director James Comey to end an investigation into former National Security Adviser Michael Flynn during an Oval Office visit in February, the New York Times has reported. "I hope you can see your way clear to letting this go, to letting Flynn go," the President said to Mr Comey during that meeting, according to the memo. "He is a good guy. I hope you can let this go."
title: Trump 'asked James Comey to shut down Michael Flynn investigation'

author: Natasha Bertrand
description: President Donald Trump hired Michael Flynn to be his national security adviser even after Flynn informed Trump's transition team that he was being...
title: 'What does Flynn have on Trump?': Flynn indicated he had a story to tell — and Trump has been eager to defend him

author: Allan Smith
description: Yates said "there is certainly a criminal statute that was implicated by" Flynn's "conduct" in an interview with CNN, her first since Trump fired her.
title: Sally Yates: There was 'certainly a criminal statute that was implicated by' Michael Flynn's conduct

author: Laura Smith-Spark, CNN
description: Fresh controversy swirls around Michael Flynn, Donald Trump's former national security adviser, after reports reveal his ties to Turkey before the inauguration.
title: Fresh questions on Flynn add to Trump turmoil
